job.title: Ezlynx API Programmer Needed for Automation
job.description:
Integration of Ezlynx API and Other Development Tasks

Project Description:

We are seeking a skilled developer to assist us in setting up and utilizing the Ezlynx API, as well as provide expertise in other related services such as Twilio and Vonage development. The primary focus of this project is to integrate the Ezlynx API into our insurance agency operations, specifically for adding, deleting, updating contacts, and policies. We are also looking for assistance in configuring the token and secret required to access the Ezlynx API.

Scope of Work:

Token and Secret Setup:

Assist in setting up the necessary token and secret for accessing the Ezlynx API.
Create an Applicant:

Develop a Postman collection with working examples to create new applicants in Ezlynx.
Update an Applicant:

Provide examples and guidance on how to update applicant information through the Ezlynx API.
Search for Applicants:

Implement functionality in Postman to search for applicants by phone number or email using the Ezlynx API.
Query Ezlynx Contacts:

Create Postman requests to query a list of Ezlynx contacts and provide documentation on how to utilize this feature.
Additional Development (Twilio and Vonage):

If you have experience with Twilio and Vonage development, we may also require assistance with related tasks. Please specify your expertise in these areas.
Requirements:

Prior experience with Ezlynx API integration is highly preferred.
Strong knowledge of Postman and API testing is required.
Familiarity with Twilio and/or Vonage development is a plus.
Excellent communication skills to provide clear documentation and guidance.
Deliverables:

Completed token and secret setup for Ezlynx API.
Functional Postman collection with examples for creating, updating, searching for applicants, and querying contacts.
Documentation on how to use the provided Postman collection.
Any additional work related to Twilio and Vonage development, if applicable.
Timeline:

We are flexible regarding the timeline, but we expect timely progress updates and a reasonable timeframe for completion based on the complexity of the tasks.

If you have the required expertise in Ezlynx API integration and other mentioned services, please submit your proposal with your relevant experience and portfolio. We look forward to collaborating with a skilled developer to streamline our insurance agency operations.

customFields.generatedDescriptionAI:
We are looking for an experienced Ezlynx API programmer to help with the automation of our processes. The project is expected to last for 3 to 6 months.

The ideal candidate should have a strong background in API development, specifically with Ezlynx. Proficiency in Python, .NET Framework, and JavaScript is also required.

The main responsibilities for this role include developing and integrating APIs, automating tasks, and improving system efficiency. You will be working closely with our team to understand our requirements and develop solutions accordingly.

To apply for this position, please submit a proposal detailing your relevant experience and how you can contribute to this project. We would also appreciate links to any past projects you have completed that demonstrate your expertise in Ezlynx API programming and automation.
